Accelerant.Description: Burning enemies receive even more damage.

Anti-Element.Description: Bullets do more damage to enemies affected by an elemental magic.

Atrophy.Description: Attacks of decaying enemies are weaker.

Battery.Description: Non-critical shots knock back and do heavily reduced damage on shocked near-death enemies.

Blood Transfer.Description: Increased chance for slain enemies to drop a Healing Elixer.

Bonus Witchfire.Description: Burning enemies drop more witchfire and crystallized witchfire.
Bonus Witchfire.Charismata: Witchfire bonus: +50% / **+100%, Crystallized Witchfire drop chance: +10% / **+30%

Cascade.Description: All weapon damage is critical for a short moment after casting any spell.

Chaos Flame.Description: Bullets randomly cause double damage to burning enemies.

Chaos Reload.Description: After spending at least half a magazine, reload can apply a random element to the new magazine.

Circle of Life.Description: Enemy deaths caused by a decay's damage tick partially recharge Decay spells.

Cleansing Fire.Description: Increased weapon damage against Elite and Ascended enemies.

Conductor.Description: Lightning bolts transfer all elemental status effects of the source.

Critical Burn.Description: Any weapon damage on burning enemies counts as critical hits.

Critical Chain.Description: Two critical hits in a row conjure an extra bullet in the magazine.

Cryovolcano.Description: Shattered frozen enemies explode for half the damage received while frozen.

Decay Echo.Description: Total decay damage is the same but ticks are stronger in the beginning and weaker near the end.

Doomsday Clock.Description: Decay never wears off and after the regular damage phase, ticks continue for a small damage.

Elemental Fire Rate.Description: Killing an enemy affected by elemental magic temporarily boosts RPM of non-automatic weapons.

Elemental Firepower.Description: Killing an enemy affected by an elemental magic temporarily boosts weapon damage.

Elemental Refresh.Description: Affecting enemies with an elemental magic refreshes all currently inflicted elemental status effects.

Empty of Magic.Description: Increased weapon damage when all spells are drained.

Extra Light Spell.Description: Light Spell has one extra charge.

Fast Heavy Spell.Description: Heavy Spell recharges faster when Light Spell is charged.

Fast Light Spell.Description: Light Spell recharges faster when Heavy Spell is charged.

Fast Strafe.Description: Increased strafe speed when aiming down sight.
Fast Strafe.Charismata: Strafe speed when aiming down sight: +50% / **+100%

Fertilizer.Description: Decaying enemies drop a pool of corrupted witchfire upon death. The pool empowers weapons and slowly heals new wounds.

Final Bullet.Description: Damage boost on the final bullet in the magazine.

Fire Orb.Description: Enemies killed when burning collapse into fire orbs that explode when another enemy gets near.
Fire Orb.Charismata: Trigger range: 10m / **14m, Explosion damage: 30 HP / **70 HP

Fire Rate Boost.Description: Increases the rate of fire of non-automatic weapons.

Firearm Mastery.Description: Increased weapon stability, handline, and aiming down sight speed.

Flashover.Description: Critical kills make burning enemies explode and ignite others.
Flashover.Charismata: Explosion range: 11m / *13m / **15m, Explosion damage: 40 Damage / *60 Damage / **80 Damage

Freezing Gust.Description: When enemies unfreeze, they explode with a freezing shockwave.

Full Health Firepower.Description: Increased weapon damage at full health.

Full of Magic.Description: Increased weapon damage for each spell charged to its fullest.

Health Sacrifice.Description: Increased weapon damage at the cost of reduced maximum health.

Heat Exhaustion.Description: Weapons instantly knock back burning minor enemies.

Ice Remnant.Description: Frozen enemies drop ice remnants when shattered. The remnants partially recharge Ice spells when picked up.

Ice Statue.Description: Minor enemies freeze indefinitely until damaged with bullets.

Ignition.Description: Casting a Fire spell grants temoprary boost to Stamina and weapons.

Immunity Reload.Description: Immunity to enemy attacks after reloading an empty magazine.

Immunity Spellcast.Description: Casting a spell grants a short moment of immunity to enemy attacks.

Immunity Swap.Description: Switching weapons grants immunity to enemy attacks for a short time.

Infectious Cloud.Description: Decaying enemies who die to a critical hit explode with an infectuous decay cloud.

Kill Reload.Description: Weapon kills partially reload the magazine.

Last Elixer.Description: Last elixer fully heals and temporarily increases health.

Lasting Element.Description: Elemental status effects on enemies last longer.

Live Wire.Description: Strongly reduced wait before Stamina begins regenerating.

Memento Mori.Description: Casting a Decay spell confuses all enemies, making them not attack for a short while.

Pagophobia.Description: Increased weapon damage against frozen targets.

Painful Recharge.Description: Spells instantly recharge when any health is lost.

Pendulum.Description: Weapon damge is inversely related to health.
Pendulum.Charismata: Weapon damage per 10 % of max health missing: +3% / *+4% / **+5%

Perun.Description: Critical hits produce more lightning bolts.

Phantom Bullets.Description: Missed bullets have a chance to rematerialize back in the magazine.

Piercing Bullets.Description: Bullets cannot be blocked by material shields.

Power Drain.Description: Damage boost for spells and weapons when Stamina is fully drained.

Putrefaction.Description: Final decay tick deals a part of target's maximum health as damage.
Putrefaction.Charismata: Final tick damage based on max HP: 20% / *25%

Pyrolysis.Description: Bonus damage to burning foes but when the burn ends, they heal part of the damage.
Pyrolysis.Charismata: Damage to burning enemies: +15% / **+25%, Percent of damage healed: 40% / **30%

Range Sacrifice.Description: Increased weapon damage at the cost of reduced range.

Recharged.Description: Enemy deaths caused by the bolts partially recharge Lightning spells.

Refreeze.Description: After the initial freeze, major enemies have a chance to freeze again.

Rekindled.Description: Killing burning enemies partially recharges Fire spells.

Reload Dash.Description: Dashing partially reloads equipped weapon and temporarily increases damage.

Reload Slide.Description: Sliding partially reloads equipped weapon and increases damage and range during the slide.

Reload Swap.Description: Switching to a weapon instandly reloads it.

Revenge.Description: Temporarily increased weapon damage after any damage is taken.

Rime Shield.Description: Casting an Ice spell temporarily affects the caster with slower movement but a more resiliant body.

Safe Deposit.Description: Death will consume only half of witchfire.

Safe Reload.Description: Temporary damage resistance after reloading a weapon.

Shattered Soul.Description: Unfreezed enemies are damaged for a part of their maximum health.

Shock Wave.Description: Critical kills on shocked enemies produce a storm shockwave that knocks back and shocks all nearby enemies.

Snowball.Description: Frozen enemies release an ice cloud when killed. The cloud seeks and freezes the nearest enemy.
Snowball.Charismata: Cloud's trigger range: 12m, Cloud's wait time: 4s

Stormbringer.Description: Casting a Lightning spell grants temporary aura that discharges lightning bolts at nearby enemies.
Stormbringer.Charismata: Duration: 6s, Bolt damage: 30 HP, Tick rate: +1s

Stun Bullets.Description: Bullets knock back and stun enemies much faster.

Touch of Death.Description: The initial decay tick always stuns minor enemies.

Witchfire Clusters.Description: Elites can drop the biggest of witchfire crystals.

Witchfire Orbs.Description: Instead of regular witchfire, dead enemies drop a quickly dissolving, high potency witchfire orb.
